Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to disclose marital status under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Disclosure of marital status in permanent residency application
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant's lack of disclosure viewed as non-compliant despite claims of unintentional omission
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Marriage documentation, application forms, hardship evidence
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Non-disclosure of marriage during initial application
Crimes.Decision_Maker: First Secretary, Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to disclose spouse in initial application
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether the refusal was reasonable and properly considered humanitarian factors
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Non-disclosure of marital status during sponsorâ€™s initial application
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Decision found to be procedurally fair
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Lack of intent not sufficient to overcome non-disclosure
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claim of lack of knowledge or intent to comply

Crimes.Crime_Name: Work Permit Refusal under Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Dispute_Type: Work permit and sponsorship application dispute
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Refusal of humanitarian and compassionate application due to prior non-disclosure
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Humanitarian and compassionate grounds application for work permit
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant's husband failed to disclose marriage; credibility undermined by omission
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Marriage records, application history, hardship claims
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Exemption based on humanitarian and compassionate grounds
Crimes.Decision_Maker: First Secretary, Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to declare spouse during initial immigration process
Crimes.Application_Factor: Attempt to include family member not examined initially
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Refusal of work permit and H&C application
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether the refusal was reasonable and adequately reasoned
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Non-disclosure of marriage in original application
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Argument based on unintentional omission and humanitarian considerations
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Inadmissibility due to misrepresentation by omission
